pages.title: Icon Search Thingy
pages.description: Search for icons across Material Design and Font Awesome.

pages.title: Picture Tools
pages.description: Tools for dealing with a massive library of pictures.  Organize photos into sub folders by date.  Extract exif data including geo points.  Bulk renaming of files.

pages.title: Hex Viewer
pages.description: A simple hex viewer and editor in case you dont want to download and install a Hex editor.
